tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: **** ****** **** **** ***** *********** ** ** *** ** *** **** ***** ******* ** ****** He looks at pediatrics ortho, spin and other ortho related problems. He specialist for spines surgery. Don't get confused that he is only for spine but he looks at all cases of Ortho . My son has left foot deformity, which he clearly guided us and he explained all procedures before surgery. I liked one point he suggested is, don't come only with reports but come with questions.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr Surya is absolutely wonderful! I took my mom to see him as a second opinion as her previous doctor was suggesting surgery for calcium deposits. She was in a lot of pain and was hardly able to walk.
Dr Surya took ample time to walk both her and me through the issue. He explained how this could be resolved with physiotherapy and exercise. He strongly advised against surgery and explained that the pain is temporary and is only due to inflammation.
He also has a great sense of humour, even my mom was so happy after meeting him. He set her mind at ease and she was already feeling better right after walking out of his chamber.
It has been 5 days since she started physiotherapy and she's already walking with a spring in her step and is even able to climb stairs.
Thank you so much Sir! We are blessed to have you as my mum's doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review:
In every profession, there are successful people. Once they achieve that success, they tend to also have some service moto. *** ***** ******* **** *** ** ****** **** ************* ** ***** *** ***** ** *** ********** *** ******* *** *********** ** *** ********* **** **** ***** * ****** ** *** ********* ** ** ******* ***** ** * ***** ******* *** ******* *** *** ********* He is violating all the widely accepted rules of duration of consultation fees, requirement of special scanning and reports in soft copies. 
With our experience, ** *** **** * ******** ** * ****** ****** never think of visiting him *** *** **** ** ***** ******* ** ******* ** *** ******* ****** **** ******** ****

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Don't visit if you value your time. I booked appointment two days in a row. Both days on visit was informed will have to wait for two hours from the scheduled time. No point of appointments.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: First of all he was very friendly and jolly,he made me comfortable to express myself.After listening to my problem and looking at my previous MRI report he advised for an x-ray, then and there an x-ray was done and the flim was given to me, on looking at the x-ray film he said that there was nothing serious with my spine and no medication is required and advised only for physiotherapy.He listens to my problems and clear all my doubts,he took his time to explained regarding my doubts and fear. I suggest others to visit him who have ortho related problems. ** ** *** ** *** **** ***

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My mother, 75 years old was completely bedridden due to fracture in her backbone in August 2018. Surgery was the only option but due to her old age backbone surgery was too risky as per doctors, family and friends. We lost all hopes before i went through the reviews of Dr. V Surya Prakash Rao and consulted him. In the first meeting itself he was confident to cure my mother through a painless surgery. Just one hour after the surgery my mother was able to walk and now today she is able to walk without any support too. The patient gets 50% cured before the surgery itself by his warm behaviour.  A Great Doctor , Great human being and God.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ******* ******* ** ***** ** ****** ** ***** ** **** * **** ****** ** ******** ** ****** After running from pillar to post finding the issue, we were blessed to have met with such a genius doctor. Hospital staff were after money and pushing us for operation when my father was severely critical  - acute sepsis with multiple organ dysfunction and sever back pain. He was persistent on not needing for an operation immediately but instead recover through better immunity build up and less meds. over the course of 15 months my father took meds and we noticed many sideeffects including peripheral arthritis and blindness, I recall a time when my father was not able to see anything and Dr Surya Prakash replied to my email spontaneously and we could see positive signs with his eyesight within a week. We have so much faith on him that we didn't see any General physician or pulmunologist after 5 months of treatment as they were mostly after visiting fees or otherwise confusing. On the other hand Dr Surya Prakash was highly professional and asked to pay visit only after 6 months and gradually but surely we saw the progress. My father is now recovering quick, he is no longer in bed, moving around and doing house work at ease. A lot of credit goes to this experienced and sincere doctor for handling the case with sensitivity and with the sole aim of helping the patient.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. surya prakash is an experienced and a very professional doctor. He was able to diagnose the exact problem my mother had and immediately recommended the next course of action. Will definitely follow his instructions and advice for my mother's spine injury and will recommend him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
No comment in doctors treatment Was good with doctor but not with hospital management,, I have observed that cost been charged additional then the price shown in practo app,
They charging 40% additionally, the t&c shows price might vary but not such huge difference, if a patient is not prepared with wallet has to rturn to home

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Doctor removed all my fears with his detailed explanation. He suggested exercise to prevent problem reoccurring.

tags: Value for money,
review: visited for neck pain. doctor asked for four x-rays. after we got them. he just saw one of them, immediately diagnosed no issue. then wondering, why he has asked for four x-rays ?
reply_text:
If the lateral view of the cervical spine is absolutely normal it is highly unlikely to have any other issues .
But if we find an abnormality in the lateral film, sending the patient again  repeatedly to the x ray department for other x Rays will cause more inconvenience to the concerned patient.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor was very friendly and took time to explain the problem in Detail. Gave very less medication and suggested few physical exercises to cure the problem.

review: he he taking consultant charge more but he is not giving proper time to patients.he is in too hurry always

review: Since the X-Ray was normal, doctor recommended me physiotherapy neck exercises. The good thing is doctor doesn't want to make you addicted to medicines. In these type of cases he recommends not be dependant on medicines and make your body fit.

review: It was a bitter experience and  awaitied time was high irrespective of booking a time slot.I visited  this doctor at medic over hospital hitech city.***** * ** ****** ******* *** ** ***** doctor asked me to take X ray of neck in 2 minutes and after that also he had not listened my pain and issues. I was dissatisfied and not recommend.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I met with a accident and had spinal arline fracture. Dr Surya Prakash has assured that surgery is not needed immediately and explained in detail with patience how to handle it for nearly 2 and half months,I was bed ridden. The fracture got auto healed .Very glad to be under his supervision and very thankful for him. Met the ***** doctor in first instance.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I got appointment at 11:30 am. I waited almost an hour and after kept on asking about doctor they said doctor not in hospital he will take more 30 min to come.after that they lead me to his assistant. hospital charge 800rs for this visit and I didn't even meet the doctor. they could say this earlier that doctor is not available. but no how could they loose their free money.pathetic experience.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: In 2007 i undergone spinesurgery by dr.suryaprakash sir.Till now there is no such instanse arise of major health issue as  before surgery.Before surgery i cant able to walk for 10 feets. Now i recently walk through a small mountain.He gave me second  life and infinnite  hope for me.Now iam bank manager in indian overseas bank. I have two childrens.All my dreams comes true only because of my god Mr.suryaprakash sir.
